00005 using namespace std;
00006 using namespace Hypertable;

00010 
00011 struct MyPolicy : Policy {
00012   static void init_options() {
00013     cmdline_desc().add_options()
00014       ("my-ip", "Display the primary IP Address of the host")
00015       ("install-dir", "Display install directory")
00016       ("property,p", strs(), "Display the value of the specified property")
00017       ;
00018   }
00019 };
00020 
00021 typedef Meta::list<MyPolicy, DefaultPolicy> Policies;
00022 
00023 void dump_all() {
00024   cout << system_info_lib_version << endl;
00025   cout << System::cpu_info() << endl;
00026   cout << System::cpu_stat() << endl;
00027   cout << System::mem_stat() << endl;
00028   cout << System::disk_stat() << endl;
00029   cout << System::os_info() << endl;
00030   cout << System::swap_stat() << endl;
00031   cout << System::net_info() << endl;
00032   cout << System::net_stat() << endl;
00033   cout << System::proc_info() << endl;
00034   cout << System::proc_stat() << endl;
00035   cout << System::fs_stat() << endl;
00036   cout << System::term_info() << endl;
00037   cout <<"{System: install_dir='"<< System::install_dir
00038        <<"' exe_name='"<< System::exe_name <<"'}" << endl;
00039 }
00040 
00041 } // local namespace
00042 
00043 int main(int ac, char *av[]) {
00044   init_with_policies<Policies>(ac, av);
00045   bool has_option = false;
00046 
00047   if (has("my-ip")) {
00048     cout << System::net_info().primary_addr << endl;
00049     has_option = true;
00050   }
00051   if (has("install-dir")) {
00052     cout << System::install_dir << endl;
00053     has_option = true;
00054   }
00055   if (has("property")) {
00056     Strings strs = get_strs("property");
00057 
00058     foreach(const String &s, strs)
00059       cout << Properties::to_str((*properties)[s]) << endl;
00060 
00061     has_option = true;
00062   }
00063   if (!has_option)
00064     dump_all();
00065 }
